ciandt.title: CI&T
ciandt.description: Working as Technical Leadership for a web-core squad, managing the team, defining and defending solutions that may impact other teams, working on technical refinements and KTs/Dojos to share knowledge across multiple squads.

ciandt2.title: CI&T
ciandt2.description: Web-core development of complex applications with several MFEs. Technical refinement of stories and tasks. Rendering, State Management, Navigation, Authentication and Error Handling. Also worked on a separate, mental wellbeing React Native app.

ciandt3.title: CI&T
ciandt3.description: Worked on multiple international projects, focused on the stabilization, migration, and modernization of legacy projects. Fullstack development with React and .NET Core.

aiqfome.title: Aiqfome
aiqfome.description: Development of front-end applications in React. Development of internal applications and dashboards; Experience with agile methodologies (scrum and kanban).

hivelabs.title: Hivelabs
hivelabs.description: Development of front-end applications in Vue JS and React. Application development in partnership with Locaweb All iN; REST APIs with NodeJS / Express and integration of SOAP interfaces.

hivelabs2.title: Hivelabs
hivelabs2.description: Development of backend systems with Node.JS / Express and frontend with React and React Native. Responsible for the implementation of digital marketing systems.

devu.title: Dev-U
devu.description: University Extension Project. Game development with Godot and Unity (C#). Management and training of the programming sector. Conducting lectures and workshops on game development.

devu2.title: Dev-U
devu2.description: University Extension Project. Game development with Godot and Unity (C#).
